baseColor.description: The primary color of the theme (editor background)

secondaryColor.description: The secondary color of the theme. Used for top bar and borders. If not defined it will be the  brighterLevel or the baseColor 43% lighter

brighterLevel.description: The brighter level of the theme. Used for top bar and borders. Used if secondaryColor os not defined. If not defined it will be the baseColor 43% lighter
